	\tdplotsetmaincoords{80}{105}

	\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1,tdplot_main_coords]

	\begin{scope}[xshift=-4.25cm, yshift=1cm, local bounding box=A,scale=2]

	\coordinate (a) at (0.125,0.125,0.625); %0
	\coordinate (b) at (0.125,0.375,0.875); %1
	\coordinate (c) at (0.125,0.625,0.125); %2
	\coordinate (d) at (0.125,0.875,0.375); %3

	\coordinate (e) at (0.375,0.125,0.875); %4
	\coordinate (f) at (0.375,0.375,0.625); %5
	\coordinate (g) at (0.375,0.625,0.375); %6
	\coordinate (h) at (0.375,0.875,0.125); %7

	\coordinate (i) at (0.625,0.125,0.125); %8
	\coordinate (j) at (0.625,0.375,0.375); %9
	\coordinate (k) at (0.625,0.625,0.625); %10
	\coordinate (l) at (0.625,0.875,0.875); %11

	\coordinate (m) at (0.875,0.125,0.375); %12
	\coordinate (n) at (0.875,0.375,0.125); %13
	\coordinate (o) at (0.875,0.625,0.875); %14
	\coordinate (p) at (0.875,0.875,0.625); %15

	\pgfmathsetmacro{\u}{0.115}
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\v}{0.115}
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\w}{0.115}

	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(a)-(\u,\v,\w)$) -- ($(a)+(\u,\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(b)-(\u,-\v,-\w)$) -- ($(b)+(\u,-\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(c)-(-\u,-\v,-\w)$) -- ($(c)+(-\u,-\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(d)-(\u,-\v,-\w)$) -- ($(d)+(\u,-\v,-\w)$);

	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(e)-(\u,-\v,\w)$) -- ($(e)+(\u,-\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(f)-(\u,\v,-\w)$) -- ($(f)+(\u,\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(g)-(\u,-\v,\w)$) -- ($(g)+(\u,-\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(h)-(-\u,-\v,\w)$) -- ($(h)+(-\u,-\v,\w)$);

	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(i)-(\u,\v,\w)$) -- ($(i)+(\u,\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(j)-(\u,-\v,-\w)$) -- ($(j)+(\u,-\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(k)-(\u,\v,\w)$) -- ($(k)+(\u,\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(l)-(-\u,\v,\w)$) -- ($(l)+(-\u,\v,\w)$);

	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(m)-(\u,-\v,\w)$) -- ($(m)+(\u,-\v,\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(n)-(\u,\v,-\w)$) -- ($(n)+(\u,\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(o)-(-\u,\v,-\w)$) -- ($(o)+(-\u,\v,-\w)$);
	\draw[very thick,Matisse,->] ($(p)-(\u,\v,-\w)$) -- ($(p)+(\u,\v,-\w)$);

	\draw[semithick] (j) -- (k) -- (f) -- (j) -- (g) -- (k);

	\draw[semithick] (m) -- (n) -- (i) -- (m) -- (j) -- (n);

	\draw[semithick] (e) -- (f) -- (a) -- (e) -- (b) -- (f);

	\draw[semithick] (g) -- (h) -- (c) -- (g) -- (d) -- (h);

	\draw[semithick] (o) -- (p) -- (k) -- (o) -- (l) -- (p);

	\pgfmathsetmacro{\a}{1}
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\r}{2}

	\path (a) node[circle, fill=Spindle, inner sep=\r]{};

	\draw[semithick] (g) -- (h) -- (c) -- (g) -- (d) -- (h);

	\draw[semithick] (o) -- (p) -- (k) -- (o) -- (l) -- (p);

	\draw[very thick,ForestGreen,densely dotted] (e) -- (f) -- (a) -- (e) -- (b) -- (f);

	\draw[very thick,ForestGreen,densely dotted] (g) -- (h) -- (c) -- (g) -- (d) -- (h);

	\draw[very thick,ForestGreen,densely dotted] (o) -- (p) -- (k) -- (o) -- (l) -- (p);

	\pgfmathsetmacro{\u}{0.025}
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\v}{0.025}
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\w}{0.025}

	\coordinate (a) at ($(a)+(\u,\v,\w)$);
	\coordinate (b) at ($(b)+(\u,-\v,-\w)$);
	\coordinate (c) at ($(c)+(-\u,-\v,-\w)$);
	\coordinate (d) at ($(d)+(\u,-\v,-\w)$);

	\coordinate (e) at ($(e)+(\u,-\v,\w)$);
	\coordinate (f) at ($(f)+(\u,\v,-\w)$);
	\coordinate (g) at ($(g)+(\u,-\v,\w)$);

	\coordinate (l) at ($(l)+(-\u,\v,\w)$);

	\coordinate (p) at ($(p)+(\u,\v,-\w)$);

	\draw[semithick] (j) -- (k) -- (f) -- (j) -- (g) -- (k);

	\draw[semithick] (e) -- (f) -- (a) -- (e) -- (b) -- (f);

	\draw[semithick] (g) -- (h) -- (c) -- (g) -- (d) -- (h);

	\draw[semithick] (o) -- (p) -- (k) -- (o) -- (l) -- (p);

	\pgfmathsetmacro{\a}{1}
